task.title: Log in the PBX Web Interface

taskbody.context: Get the PBX information and your extension information from your administrator, and log in the PBX web interface.

step.cmd: Start a web browser on your PC, enter the IP address of your PBX, press Enter on your keyboard.
step.info: The web page will inform you that the IP is unsafe.

step.cmd: Ignore the warning on the web page, proceed to the access the IP.
Enter the your user name and password, click Login.

info.note: If you cannot log in successfully, contact your administrator to check the user name and password.

choices.choice: Default User Name: Your extension number, e.g. 1000.
Default Password: Pass + Extension number, e.g. Pass1000.
